processor.name: GetDivisionCurrency
processor.description: This plugin retrieves the division currency set for the division to which the specified account is associated

configdata.Program: create procedure GetDivisionCurrency @_AccountID INTEGER @_DivisionCurrency VARCHAR OUTPUT --$ICE:('Global/SystemCurrencies','SystemCurrencies')$ AS select cast(ed.nm_enum_data as VARCHAR(255)) into @_DivisionCurrency from t_av_Internal avInternal join t_be_cor_cor_division div on upper(avInternal.c_Division) = upper(div.c_Name) join t_enum_data ed on div.c_currency = ed.id_enum_data where avInternal.id_acc = @_AccountID;
